name: Goa
review: Very nice place, great atmosphere to spend your vacation. The vibe of this place is unmatachable. Very nice place, great atmosphere to spend your vacation. The vibe of this place is unmatachable.

name: Delhi
review: Great place for history and exploration. Loved the vibe and the streat food of this place. Great place for history and exploration. Loved the vibe and the streat food of this place.

name: Kolkata
review: It's one of the most chaotic and historical city I have visited at the same time. Diverse culture, variety of places including Museums and places to visit.It's one of the most chaotic and historical city I have visited at the same time.
